name: Yie Ar Kung Fu II
overview: Yie Ar Kung-Fu II (long name Yie Ar Kung Fu II: The Emperor Yie-Gah) is a sequel to the MSX / Famicom (NES) version of Yie Ar Kung-Fu, rather than the versions directly based on the arcade release. The sequel has a 2 player mode. The BBC Microcomputer version was published by Imagine Software.
